text: Juan Antonio Bolea Foradada (30 March 1930 – 27 February 2021) was a Spanish politician. He was a Deputy from 1977 until 1979. He was the first president of Aragón from 1978 until 1981. He played a key role in the Spanish transition to democracy in that region. Bolea Foradada died on 27 February 2021 from a heart attack, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Juan Antonio Bolea Foradada
